definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The bridge rests on stone arches.
sentences.chinese: 三个拱形礅支撑着那座桥。

sentences.english: The locals know the city far better than the foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 当地人对这个城市的了解遍礅地人要多的多。

sentences.english: This stone block doesn't look very big.
sentences.chinese: 这石礅看起来也不大呀。
三个拱形礅支撑着那座桥。

sentences.english: Bareheaded , he sat upon the stone post at the door of his house.
sentences.chinese: 他光着头，坐在家门口的护墙石礅上。

definition: wooden or stone block supporting the axle of a door
stone roller (for threshing grain, leveling ground etc)/Taiwan pr. [lu4 du2]
interlocking wooden brackets between the top of a column and crossbeams used in traditional Chinese architecture
contrary/pushing against/bump/knock/used as equivalent for 搶|抢[qiang1]
spirit wall (screen wall used to shield an entrance in traditional Chinese architecture)
